price: I am indeed Most Forgiving to those who repent and believe, and do righteous deeds, then stay on the right path.”
arabic: وَإِنِّي لَغَفَّارٞ لِّمَن تَابَ وَءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا ثُمَّ ٱهۡتَدَىٰ
